name: King Worcestershire and the Dragons
description:
A text-based strategy/adventure game I created for the 8BitsToInfinity Text Only Jam. I wasn't able to put much time behind it and the scope ended up way larger than I intended (as always). However, I was able to polish up the first level to a playable standard.

Any and all comments / suggestions are welcome!

*Note:* If the text is reading too fast you can change it at any time in the options menu.

Bugs:

  •  If you lose, don't click on the continue button, use the restart button on the main menu instead (the continue button makes the game crash).
